CustomField.formula: Is_Falcon__c =false && ArrivalWindowEndTime >= NOW() && ArrivalWindowEndTime <= (NOW()+0.5/24) && (ISPICKVAL(Status, "Enroute") || ISPICKVAL(Status, "Accepted") || ISPICKVAL(Status, "Dispatched")) && (SLA_Name__c = "4hr" || SLA_Name__c = "8hr" || SLA_Name__c = "2hr Repair" || SLA_Name__c = "CBUD E After Hours" || SLA_Name__c = "2hr" || SLA_Name__c = "3hr" || SLA_Name__c = "CBUD E" || SLA_Name__c = "6hr" || SLA_Name__c = "5 Business Hours")
CustomField.label: MTTR Late to be On Site
